question: Which of the following is the main objective of the Jal Sinchan project launched by Government of India recently?
option1: Enhance the physical access of water on the farm and expand cultivable area under assured irrigation
option2: Promotion of micro-irrigation in the form of drips, sprinklers, pivots, rain-guns in the farm
answer: Promotion of micro-irrigation in the form of drips, sprinklers, pivots, rain-guns in the farm
